title: Demons
lyrics: Tone Yuh, got 'em, sex, running Fuck, got 'em, look, spotted Yuh, got 'em, sex, running Fuck, got 'em, look, spotted You're taking my heart now They're taking my heart now And I don't know why And I don't know why Alright, alright, alright, alright Alright, alright, alright (ay, ay, ay) The demons told me everything They whisper in the night (ay, ay, ay) This is not a threat, I promise (nope) I promise This is not a threat, I promise It's a warning baby I just want you to know That's when the summer caved in And I've fallen in a trench, I'm behaving I'm behaving myself (running) I'm behaving myself (look, look, look, look) We don't gotta die so soon So I just behave for you (for you, for you) So I just behave for This is not a threat, I promise (nope) I promise This is not a threat, I promise It's a warning baby Please just let me go Let me go I've seen enough I've seen enough I've seen enough
